snippet: New rules and new technology have led Wall Street to innovate, but they have also meant that old tricks appear in new guises, DealBook shows in its fall special section. | The woes of BlackBerry have put a spotlight on the Canadian mogul V. Prem...
abstract: New rules and new technology have led Wall Street to innovate, but they have also meant that old tricks appear in new guises, DealBook shows in its fall special section. | The woes of BlackBerry have put a spotlight on the Canadian mogul V. Prem Watsa. | A number of skilled financiers made billions after buying assets in the dark days of the financial crisis.
